rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示人们对抗疫苗者死亡有何反应一项新的研究表明，当公开拒绝接种 COVID-19 疫苗的人后来死于这种疾病时，观察者会对他们的命运产生复杂的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-how-do-people-react-to-anti-vaxxer-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-reveals-how-do-people-react-to-anti-vaxxer-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=993f0182-87da-4c6b-b20e-ca62328e7b5e Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:19:31 -0400 Study reveals how do people react to anti-vaxxer deaths
新的药物输送系统可能彻底改变异位妊娠的治疗俄勒冈州立大学药学院的研究人员开发了一种药物输送系统，该系统有望大大提高对患有危及生命的宫外孕的女性的药物疗效，宫外孕是指受精卵植入子宫内膜以外的地方时发生的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-drug-delivery-system-may-revolutionize-treatment-of-ectopic-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-drug-delivery-system-may-revolutionize-treatment-of-ectopic-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c9de226-e03c-4ede-b85a-2bd645db216a Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:15:23 -0400 New drug delivery system may revolutionize treatment of ectopic pregnancy
300万美元拨款用于研究睡眠和昼夜节律如何影响慢性疼痛睡眠不佳和昼夜节律会使慢性疼痛恶化吗？埃德森学院助理教授 Chung Jung Mun 计划通过一项创新的纵向研究来找出答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/243-million-grant-to-study-how-sleep-and-circadian-rhythm-affect-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/243-million-grant-to-study-how-sleep-and-circadian-rhythm-affect-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=028c03c3-0d15-4399-bba9-3626220cac95 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:10:48 -0400 $3 million grant to study how sleep and circadian rhythm affect chronic pain
《减少通货膨胀法案》规定的 35 美元胰岛素上限与处方药配药量增加有关根据南加州大学谢弗健康政策与经济中心和威斯康星大学麦迪逊分校的一项新研究，《减少通货膨胀法案》的政策将胰岛素的自付费用限制为每月 35 美元，导致医疗保险受益人注射胰岛素的总数增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Inflation-Reduction-Acts-2435-insulin-cap-linked-to-rise-in-prescription-fills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Inflation-Reduction-Acts-2435-insulin-cap-linked-to-rise-in-prescription-fills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b0581e8-a145-4195-864c-f78fd6e6d553 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:08:06 -0400 Inflation Reduction Act's $35 insulin cap linked to rise in prescription fills
研究人员找到了一种减少医疗错误的简单有效的方法我们把自己的生命托付给医生，但令人悲伤和可怕的事实是医生可能会出错。每年约有 100,000 名美国人因医疗失误而死亡，最近的研究发现，有关患者诊断和治疗的所有临床决策中有 10% 至 15% 是错误的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Researchers-find-a-simple- effective-way-to-reduce-medical-errors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Researchers-find-a-simple- effective-way-to-reduce-medical-errors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d46d2afe-cbdb-41e2-b641-5e984e89ded2 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 23:04:10 -0400 Researchers find a simple, effective way to reduce medical errors
新技术可以改善癌症转移的早期检测当癌细胞获得在体内不同部位扩散并形成新肿瘤的能力（通常通过在血管或淋巴管内移动）时，就会发生转移。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-technique-could-improve-early-detection-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-technique-could-improve-early-detection-of-cancer-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830a3749-9c82-453d-9e90-d9def7ec0f2e Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:58:35 -0400 New technique could improve early detection of cancer metastasis
食用草莓可以促进认知功能并改善心血管危险因素今天在美国营养学会年会 Nutrition 2023 上发表的一项随机临床试验显示，每日食用草莓与改善认知功能、降低血压和提高抗氧化能力有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Consuming-strawberry-may-promote-cognitive-function-and-improve-cardioangio-risk-factors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Consuming-strawberry-may-promote-cognitive-function-and-improve-cardioangio-risk-factors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3abc228-fe34-4556-94af-4ee9e6bdc4a2 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:51:28 -0400 Consuming strawberries may promote cognitive function and improve cardiovascular risk factors
使用“点击化学”创造新型多蛋白抗癌剂伦敦大学学院和斯坦福大学研究人员的一项新研究中，利用获得诺贝尔奖的“点击化学”创造了一种有效的抗癌疗法，其中分子像乐高积木一样点击在一起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Using-click-chemistry-to-create-novel-multi- Protein-anti-cancer-agents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Using-click-chemistry-to-create-novel-multi- Protein-anti-cancer-agents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ae60f5c-a84a-4bca-927d-f39d4057b0e3 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:48:45 -0400 Using 'click chemistry' to create novel multi-protein anti-cancer agents
南加州大学的研究揭示了癌细胞如何转移的关键细节南加州大学的一项令人惊讶的发现揭示了癌细胞如何转移的关键细节，并提出了阻止其扩散的新治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/USC-study-reveals-key-details-about-how-cancer-cells-metastasize.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/USC-study-reveals-key-details-about-how-cancer-cells-metastasize.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4d60466-afaf-482a-801c-597981c6a534 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:43:43 -0400 USC study reveals key details about how cancer cells metastasize
这一发现重新定义了目前对人类角膜免疫细胞景观的理解墨尔本大学的研究人员发现，保护健康人类角膜免受病原体和炎症侵害的哨兵是 T 细胞，而不是之前认为的另一种称为树突状细胞的免疫细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Discovery-redefines-current-understanding-of-immune-cell-landscape-in​​-the- human-cornea.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Discovery-redefines-current-understanding-of-immune-cell-landscape-in​​-the- human-cornea.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34f85874-e834-43d6-b7f1-8e65f669633c Mon, 24 Jul 2023 22:36:24 -0400 Discovery redefines current understanding of immune cell landscape in the human cornea
